testsuite.name: MusicAdvisorTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
Something wrong with the server response. Make sure, that you get the right feedback in your browser.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.

> auth use this link to request the access code: http://127.0.0.1:45678/authorize?client_id=2e85af4779124ccdbe87bf078a323a84&redirect_uri=http://localhost:8888&response_type=code waiting for code... code received making http request for access_token...
